    • Method Detail

      • route

        public <E extends Event<?>> void route(Object key,
                                       E event,
                                       List<Registration<Object,? extends Consumer<? extends Event<?>>>> consumers,
                                       Consumer<E> completionConsumer,
                                       Consumer<Throwable> errorConsumer)
        Description copied from interface: Router
        Routes the event, triggered by a notification with the given key to the consumers. Depending on the router implementation, zero or more of the consumers will receive the event. Upon successful completion of the event routing, the completionConsumer will be invoked. completionConsumer may be null. In the event of an exception during routing the errorConsumer is invoked. errorConsumer may be null, in which case the exception is swallowed.
        Specified by:
        route in interface Router
        Overrides:
        route in class ConsumerFilteringRouter
        Parameters:
        key - The notification key
        event - The Object to route
        consumers - The Consumers to route the event to.
        completionConsumer - The Consumer to invoke upon successful completion of event routing
        errorConsumer - The Consumer to invoke when an error occurs during event routing
